The Dictionary of Synonyms in Spanish is a very complete and easy to use application. The new app Thesaurus gives you unlimited access offline, anytime, anywhere, to the entire contents of the dictionary. Check it out!  WORKS OFFLINE  Always you have access to the entire contents of the dictionary, when and where you need it, even without being connected to the Internet. EASY TO USE  Check the latest updated words, use the search to find synonyms and save them as favorites to review them at any time.
